changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt constraints on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for UniProt data

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_UniProt {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Protein,n.name=row.name,n.tax_id=row.tax_id,n.pathway=row.pathway,n.function=row.function,n.data_source='UniProt',n.original_entity_types=split('Protein', '|')

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein/gene on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MATCH (a:db_UniProt {eid: row.eid}), (b:Gene {eid: row.gene_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:HAS_GENE]->(b)

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein/gene synonyms on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:db_UniProt {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a) SET r.type=row.type

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein/gene synonyms derived on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:db_UniProt {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a) SET r.type=row.type

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein/synonym relationship on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Create a synonym relationships for Protein id and name
changeSet.sql: CALL apoc.periodic.iterate( 'MATCH (n:db_UniProt) RETURN n', 'MERGE (s1:Synonym {name:n.name}) MERGE (s2:Synonym {name:n.eid}) MERGE (n)-[:HAS_SYNONYM]->(s1) MERGE (n)-[:HAS_SYNONYM]->(s2)', {batchSize:5000})

changeSet.id: LL-3210 load UniProt protein-GO on date 10262021
changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Create relationship between protein and GO

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MATCH (a:db_UniProt {eid: row.eid}), (b:db_GO {eid: row.go_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:GO_LINK]->(b)
